creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: dragon bracelet with heads at opening; back has 3 rows of raised spike-like motifs with fish between rows; two fish on either end facing center; in center an eight pointed star shaped motif of raised spikes; hollow; four pointed diamond in circle on top of dragon head
title: Bracelet, one of a pair
